price: Dijo [el Faraón a su pueblo]: "El Mensajero que les ha sido enviado es un demente".
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
